properties.name: db-tester.enabled
properties.description: Whether DB Tester auto-configuration is enabled.

properties.name: db-tester.auto-register-data-sources
properties.description: Whether to automatically register Spring DataSource beans with the DataSourceRegistry.

properties.name: db-tester.convention.base-directory
properties.description: Base directory for dataset resolution. Null means resolve from classpath relative to test class.

properties.name: db-tester.convention.expectation-suffix
properties.description: Suffix appended to preparation path for expectation datasets.

properties.name: db-tester.convention.scenario-marker
properties.description: Column name that identifies scenario markers in dataset files.

properties.name: db-tester.convention.data-format
properties.description: File format for dataset files (CSV or TSV).

properties.name: db-tester.convention.table-merge-strategy
properties.description: Strategy for merging tables from multiple datasets (FIRST, LAST, UNION, UNION_ALL).

properties.name: db-tester.operation.preparation
properties.description: Default operation for test preparation phase.

properties.name: db-tester.operation.expectation
properties.description: Default operation for expectation verification phase.
